title: CSS animation based on Figma design document
description: This is a CSS animation I made for a software company we were thinking of starting based on a Figma document.

title: An HTML email template clone of the Codepen newsletter
description: My father and I were thinking of becoming email developers. So I recreated this HTML email newsletter from Code Pen.
image: My father and I were thinking of becoming email developers. So I recreated this HTML email newsletter from Code Pen.

title: An HTML promotional email template
description: This Is an email template I created based on an existing email as practice for HTML email development.

title: Javascript based virus
description: This is a fun little website that overloads your computer with browser tabs and can sometimes crash your device. You probably do not want to click the button.

title: Weapons display
description: This is an inventory UI system for a game. I was quite happy with the way it turned out. I have reused it in several game-dev projects.

title: A basic 3d test
description: The title says it all. I was attempting to build a javascript 3d engine but I figured it would now be with the work but it was a fun experiment. I eventually chose to go with the Three.js Libarry for 3d web-based graphics.

title: Stolen code for phishing emails
description: This was before I was interested in HTML email development and I was testing if I could take a linked-in email template put my own info in it and use it as a phishing attack that would harvest the victim's credentials.

title: Pure CCS game
description: I got inspired by all the pure CSS games circulating on Code Pen. This was my attempt at one.

title: SASS pixel art
description: The title says it all. It was a fun little project where I made pixel art with just SASS.

title: CSS 3d cube
description: One of my many forays into web-based 3d graphics.
